summary: A woman is pursued by her murderous, psychopathic twin sister in the days leading up to their birthday.
cast: Patricia Mickey|Michael MacRae|Dennis Robertson|Morgan Most|Allison Biggers|Edith Ivey|Richard Baker|Don Devendorf|Jerry Fujikawa|Doug Dillingham|Joe Camp|Janie Baker|Huxsie Scott
keywords: animal attack|rabid dog|demon dog|evil twin sister|female homicidal maniac
director: Director: Ovidio G. Assonitis (as Oliver Hellman)
title: There Was a Little Girl
